attributes.action: Let student go toilet without a toilet pass
attributes.background: I want the government to let children go toilet during lesson because it is not fair how somew children are allowed to go because they have a toilet pass but some are not allowed because they dont have a toilet pass

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
